conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a england movie. Could you recommend a few?

It seems like you're in for a treat! If you're interested in a political drama set in England, I'd highly recommend "The Seduction of Joe Tynan." This film stars Meryl Streep and follows the journey of a respected senator who takes on a challenging case that could boost his career but complicates his personal life.

For a more lighthearted and fantastical take on England, you might enjoy "Just Visiting," where a French count ends up in modern-day Chicago after time traveling from the 1100s! It's a fun romp with plenty of laughs. Enjoy your movie night!

On the other hand, if you're looking for something more modern but still entertaining, you might enjoy "Hot Tub Time Machine" - a comedy about time travel that takes an unexpected turn in 1980s ski resorts!

If you're looking for something with a bit more adventure and less war, I'd also suggest "Dances with Wolves". In this film, Kevin Costner portrays a Union Army officer who forms a bond with a Sioux tribe in the American West, leading to an introspective journey about purpose and identity. Enjoy your movie time!
